attributes.action: stop being Prime Minister and David Cameron to become Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Well everyone is getting sick and tired of Gordon for all he is doing!

Who thinks Gordon is doing nothing but making things worse and who thinks that Gordon is wasting our money?

Who thinks and aggress that David Cameron is bound to do a better job than Gordon (and make things better)?
